FuncDef: The display multicast routing-table static command displays multicast static routes. The display multicast routing-table static command displays multicast static routes.
CLIs: display multicast routing-table [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] static [ config ] [ <prefix4> { <masklength> | <mask4> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays multicast static routes of a specified VPN instance.
vpn-instance-name specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays the configuration of the multicast static routes.
-

Displays multicast static routes of a specified multicast source address.
source-address specifies a multicast source address.
The address is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask length of the multicast source address.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Specifies the mask of the multicast source address.
The mask is in dotted decimal notation.
